home.title: Find what you need,
home.h-paragraph: When using Noa, users can search for a wide range of services, from healthcare professionals to beauty services, home services, education, and much more. The goal of Noa is to make service searching efficient and hassle-free, saving time and effort for the users.

download.title: Join to Noa's Community!
download.paragraph: You can be part of Noa's initiative. Help us grow, be part of the progress. Available now on Google Play and App Store.
download.crytography: We reach where other search engines don't.
download.privacy: With Noa you are just a few clicks away from finding what you are looking for.
download.ensure: With Noa you can not only search for what you need but also advertise your services.

aboutUs.h-paragraph: NOA's main mission is to create a platform of services to promote the inclusion of both small and large enterprises, providing services throughout the country, with easy access for users.
aboutUs.v-paragraph: NOA's vision is to provide people with access to an easy, fast and secure service, as well as to allow people to have an equal opportunity in the face of business polarization.
aboutUs.m-paragraph: In order to pro-actively guide our functions, we have efficiency and effectiveness in mind, seeking constant improvement, inclusion and approach to the world, so innovation and connection is the value that best reflects NOA.

contact.paragraph: Fill out the form below and leave us your message.
contact.name: Name
